Reviews.Title: Awesome Camera Kit
Reviews.Author: John
Reviews.Content: So far everything works great.  Good products.  I use to do photography with film some years ago.  I am going to try digital now and see what happens.  So far so good.  The camera is great.  Some of the add on products are cheap items but the most of it is good quality.

ProductInfo.Features:
KIT INCLUDES 13 PRODUCTS -- All BRAND NEW Items with all Manufacturer-supplied Accessories + Full USA Warranties:
<1> Nikon Coolpix P7800 Digital Camera (Black) + <2> Transcend 64GB SDXC 10 Card + <3> Spare EN-EL14/a Battery +
<4> PD 40.5mm (UV/CPL/ND8) Filters + <5> Precision Design ML-L3 Remote + <6> PD 50" Compact Travel Tripod +
<7> Precision Design DSLR300 Flash + <8> PD-C20 Camera/Camcorder Case + <9> PD 5pc Complete Cleaning Kit +
<10> PD SDHC Memory Card Reader + <11> PD 8 SD Card Memory Card Case + <12> LCD Screen Protectors + <13> Image Recovery Software
ProductInfo.Name: Nikon Coolpix P7800 Digital Camera (Black) with 64GB Card + Case + Flash + Battery + Tripod + 3 Filters + Remote
